name: Genesis of Exuberants
description:
The first animation of the series about the origin and subject of my paintings. 

DEFINITION
A permutation of 8 different colours expressed as an RGB triplet (red, green, blue), which each colour component state is either 'on' or 'off', is the Exuberant if amount of 'on' or 'off' states of every pair of consecutive colours differs by up to one and every pair of every fourth colour is complementary.

I dedicate it to the HEN. #HEN500k
